content: this legal document outlines the progress of a divorce case between mr cm and mrs b they have agreed to proceed with a divorce by mutual consent and have settled their mutual rights through an agreement the agreement covers various aspects such as the division of property custody of their children financial accounts and insurance policies they have also agreed on the payment of maintenance for the children the document mentions the possibility of seeking authorization for wage deductions and the involvement of the maintenance claims service both parties have waived the right to claim maintenance from each other in the future the document will be filed with the family court and the costs of the proceedings will be shared equally between the parties the parties involved have declared their full legal capacity one of the parties is bankrupt and incapacitated and has applied for a judicial reorganization and collective debt settlement the parties have chosen their residence for the purpose of executing a deed and the notary confirms their identities and civil status based on official documents the parties acknowledge their right to choose another notary if they feel their interests are not being properly represented they grant power of attorney to a specific notary named master ° g the parties have been informed and have accessed a digital copy of the deed through a secure website they have also requested an electronic copy via email the parties must receive a draft of the document at least five working days before it is executed the notary has explained the entire deed to the parties and they have all signed it
